key.name: active-mode
key.description:
This setting is used by the proxy switcher to store the most recent active state, to allow us to toggle from 'none' to the previous active state. This setting is always either 'auto' or 'manual'. If the system is already in the active state, this setting will mirror that state.
The default of 'auto' is chosen to be consistent with the default in the Settings menu when the proxy is disabled.
